A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How can some people and critics of the movie are saying it's good because it felt totally new and fresh... like how?  It's the same plot from the Ep V and VI. This movie shows that Rian Johnson has never seen SW. The lore\, the characters arc\, the pacing\,  the force/balance and its mysticism\, the appropriate jokes\, the legacy of the original trio\, the motivation for character's actions. It's all but gone. And the plot holes\, my God the plot holes were so noticeable. It feels a like a 15 years old fan fiction. Terrible. Awful. Horrible.
